channel.title: Core on OBMAN.BOT Help Center
channel.description: Recent content in Core on OBMAN.BOT Help Center

item.title: Control Panel Access
item.description:
This page is relatively simple, yet very powerful. An overview of the settings follows.

Read Access

Allow people with the following roles

The very top option is to allow people with certain roles read access to the control panel. Simply open the drop-down select menu and select the roles you wish to grant read access.

item.title: Control Panel Logs
item.description:
This page is the analogue of the audit log built in to Discord for OBMAN.BOT settings and summarizes recent edits on the control panel, listing the time, action, and responsible user for each. It is useful to audit who may be responsible if things go haywire, but other than that this page is unlikely to be of use.

Please do not be confused if you see changes from the user destroy_0001 (ID 598900258579283976), as that is the bot developer and he may at times need to change certain settings to ensure proper operation.

item.title: Command Settings
item.description:
Fine-grained control over all of OBMAN.BOT’s inbuild commands.

Overview

Command overrides allow you to restrict access to OBMAN.BOT’s inbuilt commands and optionally configure intervals after which the command trigger and response will be autodeleted. The key features of the page are shown below.

1 Command prefix. 2 All commands enabled setting. 3 Required roles. 4 Ignored roles. 5 Autodelete trigger interval. 6 Autodelete response interval. 7 Command overrides. 8 Channel overrides tabs.

item.title: All Commands
item.description:
List of all available commands offered by OBMAN.BOT and their syntax.

Legend

<required arg> [optional arg]

Text arguments containing multiple words needs be to put in quotes (“arg here”) or code ticks (arg here) if it’s not the last argument and there’s more than 1 text argument.

For example with the poll command if you want the question to have multiple words: -poll "whats your favorite color" red blue green2
